quotes.quote: Until your mission is an obsession, nothing will change in your life.
You have to live the mission, love what you do.
Each generation must discover its mission, fulfill it or betray it, in relative opacity.
Each and every generation must discover its own mission or drown into the well of oblivion.

Everyone has his own specific vocation or mission in life; everyone must carry out a concrete assignment that demands fulfillment. Therein he cannot be replaced, nor can his life be repeated, thus, everyone's task is unique as his specific opportunity to implement it.

No matter what your mission is, have some notion in your head. Forget the model, whether it's government or nonprofit or profit. Ask yourself the more important question: Is my mission improving the world? Are you sure about it? Seek to disconfirm that all the time. And if you can, change your mission.
Here is a test to find whether your mission on Earth is finished: If you're alive, it isn't.
The bigger your mission becomes, the greater inspiration you wil be given.
The most extraordinary people in the world today don’t have a career. They have a mission.
The difference between goals and mission is reflected in the difference between I want to get married and I want to have a successful marriage.
A man who has come to the full realization of his responsibility to men won't stick to one man. It will be foolhardy if he does that.
Don't lose sight of your mission trying to see it through the eyes of others.
Make your life a mission, not an intermission.
Everyone is born with a certain mission to accomplish. Everyone who walks on the earth, has his responsibilities in life.
We are on a mission: we are called to the cultivation of the earth.
Make no apologies for following your heart. A woman on a mission needs no permission.
Great things are accomplished by talented people who believe they will accomplish them.
To succeed in your mission, you must have single-minded devotion to your goal.
The only permission, the only validation, and the only opinion that matters in our quest for greatness is our own.
You are here for a special mission. There is a purpose of your life. Find that purpose of your life, work on it and live your life happily.
Greatness is a life mission, being the best is not about being better than anyone else but striving to be the best that you can and bringing out the best in others.
Every person above the ordinary has a certain mission that they are called to fulfill.

Knowing our personal mission further enhances the flow of mysterious coincidences as we are guided toward our destinies. First we have a question, then dreams, daydreams, and intuitions lead us toward the answers, which usually are synchronistically provided by the wisdom of another human being.
Every man is capable of fulfilling his mission.
Outstanding people have one thing in common: an absolute sense of mission.
Life without meaning cannot be borne. We find a mission to which we're sworn.
